doc.field: The Freedom School Newsletter and Other Freedom School and Rampant College Publications; Political Campaigns Promotional Materials; Correspondence and Publications on Communism as a Threat to Public Education and National Security; Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee and Students for a Democratic Society Reports; and Publications on South Vietnam and the National Liberation Front.
